options.name: Action : Triage
options.description: Without any equipment, you upgrade the status of an adjacent ally who is Bleeding Out to Stable by succeeding on a Medicine Check of 6. If you succeed, the next Medicine Check you make on them within 1 minute gains a 1d4 Bonus.

options.name: Nimble Hands
options.description: You are trained to be quick and efficient, even during stressful situations. Gain +1 Coordination and +1 Concentration.

options.name: Trauma Expert
options.description: As a corpsman, you have been exposed to a lot of trauma. Gain +1 Resilience. Additionally, you do not lose Resolve when an ally falls Unconscious.

options.name: Basic Medicine
options.description: You have been trained in the basics of medicine. Gain +1 Medicine. When you successfully save an Ally that is Bleeding Out, both you and them gain +1 Resolve.

options.name: Free Action : Quick Treatment
options.description: You can apply medicine such as medkits, injections and boosters as a Free Action instead of an Action.

options.name: Free Action : Bring to Safety
options.description: When ending your movement next to an ally who is either Prone or at 0 Health, you pick them up and move up to 4 units, placing them in an adjacent tile.

options.name: Cross-Trained
options.description: While you are a medic first, you have undergone the same rigerous training of accomplished soldiers and know how to handle yourself when under fire. Gain +1 Deflect and +1 Evasion.

options.name: Trusted Figure
options.description: Corpsman are honored in many cultures. Gain +1 Presence. The first Lifeline Check your allies make each day while within 6 units of you gains a 1d4 bonus.

options.name: Rifle Training
options.description: Your top priority is keeping your allies alive, and sometimes that involves shooting back. Gain +1 Ranged Weapons.

options.name: Master Corpsman
options.description: Gain +1 Medicine. If an Ally has died within the last minute and still has their vital organs, you can revive them to a Stable state by successfully using the Triage Action 3 times in a row.
